Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
Lobby
public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles the communication with the clients for the Lobby and Game, having a thread for each connected client and using a Socket and a Scanner as input and a PrintWriter as output.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Lobby​(java.lang.String host, int port)
    Creates a new lobby on the specified port and accepts players into it until a maximum of 6 players.

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby​(java.lang.String host, int port) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a new lobby on the specified port and accepts players into it until a maximum of 6 players.
      Parameters:
      host - the username of the host of the lobby.
      port - the port this lobby is hosted on.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if error occurs when connecting to lobby.
